Pre-Game Insights: The New Orleans Pelicans (6-29) are 3.5-point favorites as they look to stop a 15-game road losing streak when they take on the Washington Wizards (6-26) on Sunday, January 5, 2025 at Capital One Arena.
The contest airs at 6:00 PM ET on MNMT and Gulf Coast Sports.
The Pelicans have a 63.6% chance to win this game based on the implied probability of the moneyline.
